nodes.text: Kuat Passenger Port was a transfer station located just outside the Kuat system made up of several immense domes.
The port, one of Kuat's more colossal space stations, often saw over two billion visitors per day.

A repulsorlift transit system within the complex enabled visitors to quickly travel between the major sections of the port—the Core Dome, Outbound Dome, Military Dome, Kuat Dome, and Kuat Central Plaza.
The port employed many beings—some as baggage carriers, such as Benni.
